description.raw:
Integrated qwt to create plots. 

  - The axis labels are currently hardcoded. 

  - Y axis will auto-scale but disabled when user zooms/pans with the mouse. 

  - X-axis auto scrolls as new data come in. Window size is set to 10 simulation seconds.

Integrated introspection client in PlotManager to provide `sim_time`. Also added sample data for a few test variables in the palette. 

Things to try:

- add a variable to the y container to create a new plot

- add a variable to another variable (which creates a multi-variable) to see one plot with multiple "plot curves"

- delete a variable to remove the corresponding plot curve

- reset simulation to see new plot curves added to the existing plot

TODOs

- Make plot title and variable labels editable

- Improve user interaction with plot (zoom, pan, etc)
